phrases: Wow, this truly is amazing.
The universe really is a big place.
To think that there is a genius even greater than myself out there...
This is no time to be admiring it, Dad.
Check it out as fast as possible, okay?
Okay, okay.
So anyway, this is an incredible spaceship.
It took us to Jupiter, just like that!
Really, it was amazing!
Huh?
Sweet olives?
What is wrong with your nose?
No!
Jupiter!
Jupiter!
Anyhow, once we finish up here, we are taking off, so get everyone together!
I am counting on you!
Nah, it is nothing.
Here.
I have had enough.
No you have not!
You have got to eat, and recover from your injuries, quick.
Okay.
We have done it, Goku!
Cheer up!
Word is, we have found a spaceship!
We can go to Planet Namek!
Piccolo and Tenshinhan and the others will be coming back to life for sure!
Is that right?
Good work.
I splurged, and bought this many!
See?
G- Gohan- chan?
Where did he go!?
What is wrong?
Gohan- chan is not here.
Huh?
He was there reading his book just a little while ago.
He should not even be able to walk properly yet...
What if he breaks a bone!?
She is making too much of it.
That was close, that was close...
Gohan- chan!
Where could Gohan- chan have gone?
His legs have not healed, so he could not be up walkin'...
All righty...
That should be okay.
Gohan- chan!
Gohan- chan!
Gohan- chan!
What are you doing in a place like this!?
Mother...
It was such a nice day, I thought I would read my book outside.
Do not be so rash!
Come on, I will carry you back to the room.
I- I am completely okay now...
That carelessness of yours is dangerous.
Come on, get on.
Good grief, you are so reckless.
Who are you takin' after?
What that all means is, the spaceship is absolutely okay!
In that spaceship, you will be able to get to Planet Namek in just one month!
All that is left is to remodel the interior a little.
I would say you can leave in five days.
That is right.
To Planet Namek in Kami- sama's spaceship, huh?
Amazing!
That glimmer of light looks like it is becoming reality.
And so, Popo- san, it is all up to you to go to Planet Namek for us.
Mister Popo not going.
Mister Popo cannot go.
Be away from Kami- sama's palace two months.
Cannot.
Oh, no!
But you are the only one who knows how to speak Namekian!
You also seem pretty tough.
Popo- san, you have to be the one who goes!
No worry.
Teach you Namekian.
Well, Bulma- san, you will have to go.
If anything were to happen, you are the only one familiar with the mechanics, Bulma- san.
Fine, then.
It does not sound all that dangerous.
I will have to build in a shower room, too...
But there is no way I am going by myself, okay?
Someone come with me!
I am tellin' ya right now, there are not no way I am going.
Nobody was expecting you to.
Ahem...
Two months round trip, huh?
All right, I guess I have got no choice but to go with you.
That will just add unnecessary danger!
I knew it.
Son- kun is in this state and all...
Kuririn, you will come with me, right?
M- me?
That is okay and all, but for two months?
I wanted to train...
You never know when that Saiyan will be coming again.
Nice for you.
I wanted to go, too.
I wanted to see what kind of Shen Long would appear on Planet Namek.
Well, Goku, you stay here and rest up,
and come up with a strategy against the Saiyan, or something.
Yeah, right.
We will be counting on the both of you.
YOU- um...
What is the matter?
Have to go potty?
P- please take me, too!
G- Gohan- chan!
W- what kind of silly joke is that?
It is not a joke!
I- I really want to go...
D- do not be absurd!
It will take two more months, on top of everythin' else!
I am sorry.
I want to go, no matter what.
I want to be the one who brings Piccolo- san back to life myself.
So that is it.
Well said, Gohan.
What kind of nonsense are you two talkin'!?
There is no reason for Gohan- chan to be doing any of this!
What if anythin' were to happen!?
For cryin' out loud, he has not even healed enough!
We would better stand back.
As far as my body goes, I am fine.
W- what are you doing!?
S- stop that, Gohan- chan!
I beg you, please take me.
I will not stand for this!
I absolutely will not stand for this!
It is two months!
On top of the year of anxiety I have already been through!
What about cram school?
What about your lessons!?
You have already fallen way behind the other children!
Piccolo's got nothing to do with anythin'!
You are a little child, and you should act like a child!
Shut up!!
Gohan- chan... you have turned into a delinquent!
M- Mother... right now... right now really is not the time to be talking about that.
We all fought desperately to save everyone on earth,
and we have to bring those who died back to life,
to fight against the Saiyan once again!
I can... I can fight, too!
I have to...
I have to do something!
Understand, Mother.
I am sorry.
That kid says some pretty awesome things once in a while.
He is got you beat, Chichi.
Now let Gohan go off into space willingly.
Gohan, nice going.
You really have grown stronger.
It is okay, I tell you.
He will be completely fine.
Let us take care of him.
There will not be anything dangerous this time around, after all.
Can you learn Namekian in five days?
Right, we will have to input it all into a translator device,
so... let us see, we will need ten days.
All right, let us meet up ten days from now at Kame House!
Right!
Good day is Pikonatto.
Pikonatto, huh?
All right, you are fine.
Yow!!
You do not need to bother...
Oh, no!
If you say that, girls are not going to like you.
Time for your medicine already.
Oh, water, water...
Hit me.
All right!
Do not hold back!
Hit me as hard as you can!
Right.
Good.
If you can hit that hard, you will be fine, Gohan.
You will do a great job of standing in for me.
And so, in the blink of an eye, ten days went by,
and the day of launch had come.
Whoo!
Can we really get to Planet Namek in this thing?
Well, do not you look sharp, Kuririn?
You are not, by any chance, making light of outer space, are you?
I even cut my hair, because it would be in the way inside my space suit!
Well?
Is not Gohan- kun here yet?
He will be coming really soon, from the hospital.
He had not been discharged yet?
No.
Chichi- san insisted that he remain up until the last minute.
Good grief, she is so overprotective.
Say, Bulma- san...
Do you think we should take umbrellas?
Planet Namek will not necessarily have nice weather.
Suit yourself.
Oh, looks like they are here.
Sorry we are a little late.
So this is the spaceship, huh?
It is something else!
Okay, Gohan- chan, make sure you are careful as you go.
What is the matter?
Come on out.
Make sure you brush your teeth after meals.
Is that really you, Gohan?
What happened to your hair?
F- Father laughed at me, too.
Whatever else you might say, this is the first time man is going to outer space.
We do not want to be ill-mannered.
Uh, what is all that?
This is his change of underwear and study gear...
this is two months' worth of his medicine and vitamins...
his dryer...
his brush... his bowl and chopsticks... also-
T- that is enough.
Well, shall we get going right away, then?
For some reason, I am feeling discouraged.
We are depending on you.
Make sure you find the Dragon Balls for us.
Right!
Piccolo
Grandpa, Mother, Turtle Hermit- san, Turtle- san, we are off.
Take care.
Piccolo
Make sure to eat all your meals!
Send me a letter every day!
Bye!
This is a little exciting, huh?
Say, Bulma- san, where should I put my bag?
You can stick it wherever you need to, cannot you!?
Hurry up and sit down!
She is in a bad mood for some reason.
Five seconds to launch!
Destination: Planet Namek!
J- just a minute!
W-w-we still have not f-fastened our b-b-belts!
It is too late to stop now, you know!
T- that truly is some tremendous speed.
They are out of sight already.
Gohan- chan!
Be sure to rinse, too!
You can move about freely now.
Once we are out of the atmosphere, everything calms down.
Eh?
Already?
I wanted to see Earth.
Huh?
What are you doing, Bulma- san?
How nosy!
I am changing my clothes!
You are changing?
You mean, into pajamas?
You are going to bed already?
Whoops, come to think of it, I forgot to bring pajamas myself.
What about you, Gohan?
I made sure I brought some.
I know it is none of my business,
but cannot you do anything about that Shichigosan outfit?
This is just for the first part.
I actually have some clothes that I made without Mother finding out about it.
Well?
You really do look up to Piccolo, do not you?
Yes.
About the same as I do Father.
Huh?
T- those are unusual pajamas, huh?
They look hard to sleep in.
Of course they are not pajamas!
When I saw you guys,
I felt like an idiot for working so hard getting ready to go into space.
Hey, did we do something wrong?
Search me.
Good luck, Gohan.
The trio had departed for Planet Namek, carrying the hopes of Goku and the others...
